trans-unit.source: Type conversion
trans-unit.target: 類型轉換

trans-unit.source: Type conversion
trans-unit.target: 類型轉換

trans-unit.source: .NET, .NET Core
trans-unit.target: .NET, .NET Core

trans-unit.source: Type conversion
trans-unit.target: 類型轉換

trans-unit.source: Every value has an associated type, which defines attributes such as the amount of space allocated to the value, the range of possible values it can have, and the members that it makes available.
trans-unit.target: 每個值都有相關聯的類型，該類型定義屬性，例如配置給值的空間量、能夠擁有的可能值範圍，以及提供的成員。

trans-unit.source: Many values can be expressed as more than one type.
trans-unit.target: 許多值都可以表示成多種類型。

trans-unit.source: For example, the value `4` can be expressed as an integer or a floating-point value.
trans-unit.target: 例如，數值 `4` 就可以表示成整數值或浮點數值。

trans-unit.source: Type conversion creates a value in a new type that is equivalent to the value of an old type, but does not necessarily preserve the identity (or exact value) of the original object.
trans-unit.target: 類型轉換會建立新類型的值，與舊類型的值相等，但是不一定會保留原始物件的識別 (或實際的值)。

trans-unit.source: .NET automatically supports the following conversions:
trans-unit.target: .NET 自動支援下列轉換︰

trans-unit.source: Conversion from a derived class to a base class.
trans-unit.target: 從衍生類別轉換成基底類別。

trans-unit.source: This means, for example, that an instance of any class or structure can be converted to an [Object](xref:System.Object) instance.
trans-unit.target: 舉例來說，這表示任何類別或結構的執行個體都可以轉換成 [Object](xref:System.Object) 執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This conversion does not require a casting operator.
trans-unit.target: 這種轉換不需要轉型運算子。

trans-unit.source: Conversion from a base class back to the original derived class.
trans-unit.target: 從基底類別轉換回原始的衍生類別。

trans-unit.source: In C#, this conversion requires a casting operator.
trans-unit.target: 在 C# 中，這種轉換需要轉型運算子。

trans-unit.source: In Visual Basic, it requires the `CType` operator if `Option Strict` is on.
trans-unit.target: 在 Visual Basic 中，如果已 `Option Strict` 開啟則需要 `CType` 運算子。

trans-unit.source: Conversion from a type that implements an interface to an interface object that represents that interface.
trans-unit.target: 從實作介面的類型轉換成代表該介面的介面物件。

trans-unit.source: This conversion does not require a casting operator.
trans-unit.target: 這種轉換不需要轉型運算子。

trans-unit.source: Conversion from an interface object back to the original type that implements that interface.
trans-unit.target: 從介面物件轉換回實作該介面的原始類型。

trans-unit.source: In C#, this conversion requires a casting operator.
trans-unit.target: 在 C# 中，這種轉換需要轉型運算子。

trans-unit.source: In Visual Basic, it requires the `CType` operator if `Option Strict` is on.
trans-unit.target: 在 Visual Basic 中，如果已 `Option Strict` 開啟則需要 `CType` 運算子。

trans-unit.source: In addition to these automatic conversions, .NET provides several features that support custom type conversion.
trans-unit.target: 除了這些自動轉換以外，.NET 還提供多項支援自訂類型轉換的功能。

trans-unit.source: These include the following:
trans-unit.target: 這些需求包括下列各項：

trans-unit.source: The `Implicit` operator, which defines the available widening conversions between types.
trans-unit.target: `Implicit` 運算子，這個運算子定義類型之間可用的擴展轉換。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the [Implicit conversion with the Implicit operator](#implicit-conversion-with-the-implicit-operator) section.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[使用 Implicit 運算子進行隱含轉換](#implicit-conversion-with-the-implicit-operator)一節。

trans-unit.source: The `Explicit` operator, which defines the available narrowing conversions between types.
trans-unit.target: `Explicit` 運算子，這個運算子定義類型之間可用的縮小轉換。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the [Explicit conversion with the Explicit operator](#explicit-conversion-with-the-explicit-operator) section.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[使用 Explicit 運算子進行明確轉換](#explicit-conversion-with-the-explicit-operator)一節。

trans-unit.source: The [IConvertible](xref:System.IConvertible) interface, which defines conversions to each of the base .NET data types.
trans-unit.target: [IConvertible](xref:System.IConvertible) 介面，這個介面定義轉換至每一個基底 .NET 資料類型的方式。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the [The IConvertible interface](#the-iconvertible-interface) section.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [IConvertible 介面](#the-iconvertible-interface)一節。

trans-unit.source: The [Convert](xref:System.Convert) class, which provides a set of methods that implement the methods in the `IConvertible` interface.
trans-unit.target: [Convert](xref:System.Convert) 類別，這個類別提供一組方法以實作 `IConvertible` 介面中的方法。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the [The Convert class](#the-convert-class) section.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Convert 類別](#the-convert-class)一節。

trans-unit.source: The [TypeConverter](xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter) class, which is a base class that can be extended to support the conversion of a specified type to any other type.
trans-unit.target: [TypeConverter](xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter) 類別，這個類別是基底類別，並可擴充以支援從指定的類型轉換至其他任何類型。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the [The TypeConverter class](#the-typeconverter-class) section.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [TypeConverter 類別](#the-typeconverter-class)一節。

trans-unit.source: Implicit conversion with the Implicit operator
trans-unit.target: 使用 Implicit 運算子進行隱含轉換

trans-unit.source: Widening conversions involve the creation of a new value from the value of an existing type that has either a more restrictive range or a more restricted member list than the target type.
trans-unit.target: 擴展轉換包含從現有類型的值來建立新的值，這個類型具有比目標類型更嚴格的範圍或更受限制的成員清單。

trans-unit.source: Widening conversions cannot result in data loss (although they may result in a loss of precision).
trans-unit.target: 擴展轉換不可能導致資料遺失 (雖然可能導致精確度降低)。

trans-unit.source: Because data cannot be lost, compilers can handle the conversion implicitly or transparently, without requiring the use of an explicit conversion method or a casting operator.
trans-unit.target: 因為不可能遺失資料，編譯器可以隱含地 (或直接地) 處理轉換，而不需要使用明確的轉換方法或轉型運算子。

trans-unit.source: Although code that performs an implicit conversion can call a conversion method or use a casting operator, their use is not required by compilers that support implicit conversions.
trans-unit.target: 雖然執行隱含轉換的程式碼可以呼叫轉換方法或使用轉型運算子，但支援隱含轉換的編譯器並不需要這些動作。

trans-unit.source: For example, the [Decimal](xref:System.Decimal) type supports implicit conversions from [Byte](xref:System.Byte), [Char](xref:System.Char), [Int16](xref:System.Int16), [Int32](xref:System.Int32), [Int64](xref:System.Int64), [SByte](xref:System.SByte), [UInt16](xref:System.UInt16), [UInt32](xref:System.UInt32), and [UInt64](xref:System.UInt64) values.
trans-unit.target: 例如，[Decimal](xref:System.Decimal) 類型支援從 [Byte](xref:System.Byte)、[Char](xref:System.Char)、[Int16](xref:System.Int16)、[Int32](xref:System.Int32)、[Int64](xref:System.Int64)、[SByte](xref:System.SByte)、[UInt16](xref:System.UInt16)、[UInt32](xref:System.UInt32) 和 [UInt64](xref:System.UInt64) 值的隱含轉換。

trans-unit.source: The following example illustrates some of these implicit conversions in assigning values to a `Decimal` variable.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例說明其中一部分隱含轉換在指派值給 `Decimal` 變數時的情形。

trans-unit.source: If a particular language compiler supports custom operators, you can also define implicit conversions in your own custom types.
trans-unit.target: 如果特定的語言編譯器支援自訂運算子，您也可以在自己的自訂類型中定義隱含轉換。

trans-unit.source: The following example provides a partial implementation of a signed byte data type named `ByteWithSign` that uses sign-and-magnitude representation.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例針對使用正負號和大小表示之名為 `ByteWithSign` 的帶正負號位元組資料類型，提供部分實作。

trans-unit.source: It supports implicit conversion of [Byte](xref:System.Byte) and [SByte](xref:System.SByte) values to `ByteWithSign` values.
trans-unit.target: 它支援將 [Byte](xref:System.Byte) 和 [SByte](xref:System.SByte) 值隱含轉換為 `ByteWithSign` 值。

trans-unit.source: Client code can then declare a `ByteWithSign` variable and assign it [Byte](xref:System.Byte) and [SByte](xref:System.SByte) values without performing any explicit conversions or using any casting operators, as the following example shows.
trans-unit.target: 然後，用戶端程式碼可以宣告 `ByteWithSign` 變數並指派 [Byte](xref:System.Byte) 和 [SByte](xref:System.SByte) 值給它，而不需要執行任何明確的轉換，也不需要使用任何轉型運算子，如下列範例所示。

trans-unit.source: Explicit conversion with the Explicit operator
trans-unit.target: 使用 Explicit 運算子進行明確轉換

trans-unit.source: Narrowing conversions involve the creation of a new value from the value of an existing type that has either a greater range or a larger member list than the target type.
trans-unit.target: 縮小轉換包含從現有類型的值來建立新的值，這個類型具有比目標類型更廣的範圍或更大的成員清單。

trans-unit.source: Because a narrowing conversion can result in a loss of data, compilers often require that the conversion be made explicit through a call to a conversion method or a casting operator.
trans-unit.target: 因為縮小轉換可能導致資料遺失，編譯器通常會要求必須透過呼叫轉換方法或轉型運算子來明確執行轉換。

trans-unit.source: That is, the conversion must be handled explicitly in developer code.
trans-unit.target: 也就是說，開發人員程式碼中必須明確處理轉換。

trans-unit.source: The major purpose of requiring a conversion method or casting operator for narrowing conversions is to make the developer aware of the possibility of data loss or an [OverflowException](xref:System.OverflowException) so that it can be handled in code.
trans-unit.target: 縮小轉換之所以需要轉換方法或轉型運算子，主要目的是讓開發人員知道可能遺失資料，或可能發生 [OverflowException](xref:System.OverflowException)，以便在程式碼中處理。

trans-unit.source: However, some compilers can relax this requirement.
trans-unit.target: 不過，某些編譯器可能會放寬這項需求。

trans-unit.source: For example, in Visual Basic, if `Option Strict` is off (its default setting), the Visual Basic compiler tries to perform narrowing conversions implicitly.
trans-unit.target: 例如，在 Visual Basic 中，如果 `Option Strict` 已關閉 (此為預設)，則 Visual Basic 編譯器會嘗試隱含地執行縮小轉換。

trans-unit.source: For example, the [UInt32](xref:System.UInt32), [Int64](xref:System.Int64), and [UInt64](xref:System.UInt64) data types have ranges that exceed that the [Int32](xref:System.Int32) data type, as the following table shows.
trans-unit.target: 例如，[UInt32](xref:System.UInt32)、[Int64](xref:System.Int64) 和 [UInt64](xref:System.UInt64) 資料類型的範圍超過 [Int32](xref:System.Int32) 資料類型的範圍，如下表所示。

trans-unit.source: Type
trans-unit.target: 類型

trans-unit.source: Comparison with range of Int32
trans-unit.target: 與 Int32 的範圍比較

trans-unit.source: [Int64](xref:System.Int64)
trans-unit.target: [Int64](xref:System.Int64)

trans-unit.source: [Int64.MaxValue](xref:System.Int64.MaxValue) is greater than [Int32.MaxValue](xref:System.Int32#System_Int32_MaxValue), and [Int64.MinValue](xref:System.Int64.MinValue) is less than (has a greater negative range than) [Int32.MinValue](xref:System.Int32#System_Int32_MinValue).
trans-unit.target: [Int64.MaxValue](xref:System.Int64.MaxValue) 大於 [Int32.MaxValue](xref:System.Int32#System_Int32_MaxValue)，而 [Int64.MinValue](xref:System.Int64.MinValue) 小於 (負值範圍大於) [Int32.MinValue](xref:System.Int32#System_Int32_MinValue)。

trans-unit.source: [UInt32](xref:System.UInt32)
trans-unit.target: [UInt32](xref:System.UInt32)

trans-unit.source: [UInt32.MaxValue](xref:System.UInt32.MaxValue) is greater than [Int32.MaxValue](xref:System.Int32.MaxValue).
trans-unit.target: [UInt32.MaxValue](xref:System.UInt32.MaxValue) 大於 [Int32.MaxValue](xref:System.Int32.MaxValue)。

trans-unit.source: [UInt64](xref:System.UInt64)
trans-unit.target: [UInt64](xref:System.UInt64)

trans-unit.source: [UInt64.MaxValue](xref:System.UInt64.MaxValue) is greater than [Int32.MaxValue](xref:System.Int32.MaxValue).
trans-unit.target: [UInt64.MaxValue](xref:System.UInt64.MaxValue) 大於 [Int32.MaxValue](xref:System.Int32.MaxValue)。

trans-unit.source: To handle such narrowing conversions, .NET allows types to define an `Explicit` operator.
trans-unit.target: 為了處理縮小轉換，.NET 允許類型定義 `Explicit` 運算子。

trans-unit.source: Individual language compilers can then implement this operator using their own syntax, or a member of the [Convert](xref:System.Convert) class can be called to perform the conversion.
trans-unit.target: 然後，個別語言編譯器就可以使用自己的語法來實作這個運算子，也可以呼叫 [Convert](xref:System.Convert) 類型的成員來執行轉換

trans-unit.source: (For more information about the `Convert` class, see [The Convert class](#the-convert-class) later in this topic.) The following example illustrates the use of language features to handle the explicit conversion of these potentially out-of-range integer values to [Int32](xref:System.Int32) values.
trans-unit.target: (如需 `Convert` 類別的詳細資訊，請參閱本主題後文的 [Convert 類別](#the-convert-class))。下列範例說明如何使用語言功能，將這些可能超出範圍的整數值明確轉換至 [Int32](xref:System.Int32) 值。

trans-unit.source: Explicit conversions can produce different results in different languages, and these results can differ from the value returned by the corresponding [Convert](xref:System.Convert) method.
trans-unit.target: 明確轉換在不同的語言中可能會產生不同的結果，這些結果可能與對應的 [Convert](xref:System.Convert) 方法所傳回的值不同。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the [Double](xref:System.Double) value **12.63251** is converted to an [Int32](xref:System.Int32), both the .NET [Convert.ToInt32(Double)](xref:System.Convert.ToInt32(System.Double)) and the Visual Basic `CInt` method method rounds the [Double](xref:System.Double) to return a value of **13**, but the C# `(int)` operator truncates the [Double](xref:System.Double) to return a value of **12**.
trans-unit.target: 好比說，如果 [Double](xref:System.Double) 值 **12.63251** 轉換為 [Int32](xref:System.Int32)，則 .NET [Convert.ToInt32(Double)](xref:System.Convert.ToInt32(System.Double)) 和 Visual Basic `CInt` 方法都會四捨五入 [Double](xref:System.Double) 而傳回 **13**，但 C# `(int)` 運算子會截斷 [Double](xref:System.Double) 而傳回 **12**。

trans-unit.source: Similarly, the C# `(int)` operator does not support Boolean-to-integer conversion, but the Visual Basic `CInt` method converts a value of `true` to **-1**.
trans-unit.target: 同樣地，C# `(int)` 運算子不支援布林值對整數的轉換，但 Visual Basic `CInt` 方法會將 `true` 的值轉換為 **-1**。

trans-unit.source: On the other hand, the [Convert.ToInt32(Boolean)](xref:System.Convert.ToInt32(System.Boolean)) method converts a value of `true` to **1**.
trans-unit.target: 反之，[Convert.ToInt32(Boolean)](xref:System.Convert.ToInt32(System.Boolean)) 方法會將 `true` 的值轉換為 **1**。

trans-unit.source: Most compilers allow explicit conversions to be performed in a checked or unchecked manner.
trans-unit.target: 大多數的編譯器都允許明確轉換以已檢查或未檢查的方式執行。

trans-unit.source: When a checked conversion is performed, an [OverflowException](xref:System.OverflowException) is thrown when the value of the type to be converted is outside the range of the target type.
trans-unit.target: 如果執行已檢查的轉換，當要轉換之類型的值不在目標類型的範圍內時，會擲回 [OverflowException](xref:System.OverflowException)。

trans-unit.source: When an unchecked conversion is performed under the same conditions, the conversion might not throw an exception, but the exact behavior becomes undefined and an incorrect value might result.
trans-unit.target: 在同樣的狀況下執行未檢查的轉換時，轉換可能不會擲回例外狀況，但實際行為會變得不明確，且可能產生不正確的值。

trans-unit.source: In C#, checked conversions can be performed by using the `checked` keyword together with a casting operator, or by specifying the `/checked+` compiler option.
trans-unit.target: 在 C# 中，已檢查的轉換可以透過使用 `checked` 關鍵字搭配轉型運算子來執行，也可以指定 `/checked+` 編譯器選項來執行。

trans-unit.source: Conversely, unchecked conversions can be performed by using the `unchecked` keyword together with the casting operator, or by specifying the `/checked-` compiler option.
trans-unit.target: 相反地，未檢查的轉換可使用 `unchecked` 關鍵字搭配轉型運算子來執行，或可以指定 `/checked-` 編譯器選項來執行。

trans-unit.source: By default, explicit conversions are unchecked.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，明確轉換是未檢查的。

trans-unit.source: In Visual Basic, checked conversions can be performed by specifying the `/removeintchecks-` compiler option.
trans-unit.target: 在 Visual Basic 中，您可以指定 `/removeintchecks-` 編譯器選項來執行已檢查的轉換。

trans-unit.source: Conversely, unchecked conversions can be performed by specifying the `/removeintchecks+` compiler option.
trans-unit.target: 反之，您可以指定 `/removeintchecks+` 編譯器選項來執行未檢查的轉換。

trans-unit.source: By default, explicit conversions are checked.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，明確轉換是檢查的。

trans-unit.source: The following C# example uses the `checked` and `unchecked` keywords to illustrate the difference in behavior when a value outside the range of a [Byte](xref:System.Byte) is converted to a `Byte`.
trans-unit.target: 下列 C# 範例使用 `checked` 和 `unchecked` 關鍵字，說明將超出 [Byte](xref:System.Byte) 範圍的值轉換為 `Byte` 時的行為差異。

trans-unit.source: The checked conversion throws an exception, but the unchecked conversion assigns [Byte.MaxValue](xref:System.Byte.MaxValue) to the `Byte` variable.
trans-unit.target: 已檢查的轉換會擲回例外狀況，但未檢查的轉換會指派 [Byte.MaxValue](xref:System.Byte.MaxValue) 給 `Byte` 變數。

trans-unit.source: If a particular language compiler supports custom overloaded operators, you can also define explicit conversions in your own custom types.
trans-unit.target: 如果特定的語言編譯器支援自訂多載運算子，您也可以在自己的自訂類型中定義明確轉換。

trans-unit.source: The following example provides a partial implementation of a signed byte data type named `ByteWithSign` that uses sign-and-magnitude representation.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例針對使用正負號和大小表示之名為 `ByteWithSign` 的帶正負號位元組資料類型，提供部分實作。

trans-unit.source: It supports explicit conversion of [Int32](xref:System.Int32) and [UInt32](xref:System.UInt32) values to `ByteWithSign` values.
trans-unit.target: 它支援將 [Int32](xref:System.Int32) 和 [UInt32](xref:System.UInt32) 值明確轉換為 `ByteWithSign` 值。

trans-unit.source: Client code can then declare a `ByteWithSign` variable and assign it [Int32](xref:System.Int32) and [UInt32](xref:System.UInt32) values if the assignments include a casting operator, as the following example shows.
trans-unit.target: 然後，用戶端程式碼可以宣告 `ByteWithSign` 變數並指派 [Int32](xref:System.Int32) 和 [UInt32](xref:System.UInt32) 值給它 (如果指派包含轉型運算子的話)，如下列範例所示。

trans-unit.source: The IConvertible interface
trans-unit.target: IConvertible 介面

trans-unit.source: To support the conversion of any type to a common language runtime base type, .NET provides the [IConvertible](xref:System.IConvertible) interface.
trans-unit.target: 為了支援從任何類型轉換至通用語言執行平台基底類型，.NET 提供 [IConvertible](xref:System.IConvertible) 介面。

trans-unit.source: The implementing type is required to provide the following:
trans-unit.target: 實作類型需要提供下列項目：

trans-unit.source: A method that returns the [TypeCode](xref:System.TypeCode) of the implementing type.
trans-unit.target: 傳回實作類型 [TypeCode](xref:System.TypeCode) 的方法。

trans-unit.source: Methods to convert the implementing type to each common language runtime base type ([Boolean](xref:System.Boolean), [Byte](xref:System.Byte), [DateTime](xref:System.DateTime), [Decimal](xref:System.Decimal), [Double](xref:System.Double), and so on).
trans-unit.target: 將實作類型轉換為每一個通用語言執行平台基底類型 ([Boolean](xref:System.Boolean)、[Byte](xref:System.Byte)、[DateTime](xref:System.DateTime)、[Decimal](xref:System.Decimal)、[Double](xref:System.Double) 等) 的方法。

trans-unit.source: A generalized conversion method to convert an instance of the implementing type to another specified type.
trans-unit.target: 將實作類型的執行個體轉換為另一個指定之類型的通用轉換方法。

trans-unit.source: Conversions that are not supported should throw an [InvalidCastException](xref:System.InvalidCastException).
trans-unit.target: 不支援的轉換應該擲回 [InvalidCastException](xref:System.InvalidCastException)。

trans-unit.source: Each common language runtime base type (that is, the [Boolean](xref:System.Boolean), [Byte](xref:System.Byte), [Char](xref:System.Char), [DateTime](xref:System.DateTime), [Decimal](xref:System.Decimal), [Double](xref:System.Double), [Int16](xref:System.Int16), [Int32](xref:System.Int32), [Int64](xref:System.Int64), [SByte](xref:System.SByte), [Single](xref:System.Single), [String](xref:System.String), [UInt16](xref:System.UInt16), [UInt32](xref:System.UInt32), and [UInt64](xref:System.UInt64), as well as the [DBNull](xref:System.DBNull) and [Enum](xref:System.Enum) types, implement the [IConvertible](xref:System.IConvertible) interface.
trans-unit.target: 每一個通用語言執行平台基底類型 (亦即 [Boolean](xref:System.Boolean)、[Byte](xref:System.Byte)、[Char](xref:System.Char)、[DateTime](xref:System.DateTime)、[Decimal](xref:System.Decimal)、[Double](xref:System.Double)、[Int16](xref:System.Int16)、[Int32](xref:System.Int32)、[Int64](xref:System.Int64)、[SByte](xref:System.SByte), [Single](xref:System.Single)、[String](xref:System.String)、[UInt16](xref:System.UInt16)、[UInt32](xref:System.UInt32) 和 [UInt64](xref:System.UInt64)，以及 [DBNull](xref:System.DBNull) 和 [Enum](xref:System.Enum) 類型)，皆會實作 [IConvertible](xref:System.IConvertible) 介面。

trans-unit.source: However, these are explicit interface implementations; the conversion method can be called only through an [IConvertible](xref:System.IConvertible) interface variable, as the following example shows.
trans-unit.target: 不過，這些都是明確的介面實作，且只能透過 [IConvertible](xref:System.IConvertible) 介面變數來呼叫轉換方法，如下列範例所示。

trans-unit.source: This example converts an [Int32](xref:System.Int32) value to its equivalent [Char](xref:System.Char) value.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例將 [Int32](xref:System.Int32) 值轉換為其對等的 [Char](xref:System.Char) 值。

trans-unit.source: The requirement to call the conversion method on its interface rather than on the implementing type makes explicit interface implementations relatively expensive.
trans-unit.target: 由於必須呼叫其介面上的轉換方法，而不是呼叫實作類型上的轉換方法，這種需求使得明確介面實作相當耗費資源。

trans-unit.source: Instead, we recommend that you call the appropriate member of the [Convert](xref:System.Convert) class to convert between common language runtime base types.
trans-unit.target: 因此，在通用語言執行平台基底類型之間轉換時，我們建議您改為呼叫 [Convert](xref:System.Convert) 類別的適當成員。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the next section, [The Convert class](#the-convert-class).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱下節的 [Convert 類別](#the-convert-class)。

trans-unit.source: In addition to the [IConvertible](xref:System.IConvertible) interface and the [Convert](xref:System.Convert) class provided by .NET, individual languages may also provide ways to perform conversions.
trans-unit.target: 除了 .NET 提供的 [IConvertible](xref:System.IConvertible) 介面和 [Convert](xref:System.Convert) 類別之外，個別語言可能還會提供執行轉換的方式。

trans-unit.source: For example, C# uses casting operators; Visual Basic uses compiler-implemented conversion functions such as `CType`, `CInt`, and `DirectCast`.
trans-unit.target: 例如，C# 使用轉型 (Casting) 運算子、Visual Basic 使用編譯器實作的轉換函式，例如 `CType`、`CInt` 和 `DirectCast`。

trans-unit.source: For the most part, the [IConvertible](xref:System.IConvertible) interface is designed to support conversion between the base types in .NET.
trans-unit.target: 在大多數情況下，[IConvertible](xref:System.IConvertible) 介面的設計主要是支援在 .NET 中各基底類型之間的轉換。

trans-unit.source: However, the interface can also be implemented by a custom type to support conversion of that type to other custom types.
trans-unit.target: 不過，也可以使用自訂類型來實作介面，以支援從該類型轉換至其他自訂類型。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the section [Custom conversions with the ChangeType method](#custom-conversions-with-the-changetype-method) later in this topic.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱本主題後文的[使用 ChangeType 方法進行自訂轉換](#custom-conversions-with-the-changetype-method)一節。

trans-unit.source: The Convert class
trans-unit.target: Convert 類別

trans-unit.source: Although each base type's [IConvertible](xref:System.IConvertible) interface implementation can be called to perform a type conversion, calling the methods of the [System.Convert](xref:System.Convert) class is the recommended language-neutral way to convert from one base type to another.
trans-unit.target: 雖然可以呼叫每一個基底類別的 [IConvertible](xref:System.IConvertible) 介面實作來執行類型轉換，但建議的語言中立方式是呼叫 [System.Convert](xref:System.Convert) 類別的方法，在不同的基底類型之間轉換。

trans-unit.source: In addition, the [Convert.ChangeType(Object, Type, IFormatProvider)](xref:System.Convert.ChangeType(System.Object,System.Type,System.IFormatProvider)) method can be used to convert from a specified custom type to another type.
trans-unit.target: 此外，也可以使用 [Convert.ChangeType(Object, Type, IFormatProvider)](xref:System.Convert.ChangeType(System.Object,System.Type,System.IFormatProvider)) 方法將指定的自訂類型轉換為另一種類型。

trans-unit.source: Conversions between base types
trans-unit.target: 基底類型之間的轉換

trans-unit.source: The [Convert](xref:System.Convert) class provides a language-neutral way to perform conversions between base types and is available to all languages that target the common language runtime.
trans-unit.target: [Convert](xref:System.Convert) 類別提供在基底類型之間執行轉換的語言中立方式，且適用於所有以通用語言執行平台為目標的語言。

trans-unit.source: It provides a complete set of methods for both widening and narrowing conversions, and throws an [InvalidCastException](xref:System.InvalidCastException) for conversions that are not supported (such as the conversion of a [DateTime](xref:System.DateTime) value to an integer value).
trans-unit.target: 它對於擴展和縮小轉換提供一組完整的方法，且對於不支援的轉換 (例如，將 [DateTime](xref:System.DateTime) 值轉換為整數值) 會擲回 [InvalidCastException](xref:System.InvalidCastException)。

trans-unit.source: Narrowing conversions are performed in a checked context, and an [OverflowException](xref:System.OverflowException) is thrown if the conversion fails.
trans-unit.target: 縮小轉換是在已檢查的內容中執行，如果轉換失敗，則會擲回 [OverflowException](xref:System.OverflowException)。

trans-unit.source: Because the [Convert](xref:System.Convert) class includes methods to convert to and from each base type, it eliminates the need to call each base type's [IConvertible](xref:System.IConvertible) explicit interface implementation.
trans-unit.target: 因為 [Convert](xref:System.Convert) 類別包含在每一個基底類型之間來回轉換的方法，所以不需要呼叫每一個基底類型的 [IConvertible](xref:System.IConvertible) 明確介面實作。

trans-unit.source: The following example illustrates the use of the [System.Convert](xref:System.Convert) class to perform several widening and narrowing conversions between .NET base types.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例說明如何使用 [System.Convert](xref:System.Convert) 類別，在 .NET 基底類型之間執行數個擴展和縮小轉換。

trans-unit.source: In some cases, particularly when converting to and from floating-point values, a conversion may involve a loss of precision, even though it does not throw an [OverflowException](xref:System.OverflowException).
trans-unit.target: 在某些情況下，尤其是在浮點數值之間來回轉換時，即使沒有擲回 [OverflowException](xref:System.OverflowException)，轉換也可能會降低精確度。

trans-unit.source: The following example illustrates this loss of precision.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例說明這種精確度降低情況。

trans-unit.source: In the first case, a [Decimal](xref:System.Decimal) value has less precision (fewer significant digits) when it is converted to a [Double](xref:System.Double).
trans-unit.target: 在第一種情況下，[Decimal](xref:System.Decimal) 值在轉換為 [Double](xref:System.Double) 時會降低精確度 (有效位數較少)。

trans-unit.source: In the second case, a [Double](xref:System.Double) value is rounded from **42.72** to **43** in order to complete the conversion.
trans-unit.target: 在第二種情況下，[Double](xref:System.Double) 值會從 **42.72** 四捨五入為 **43**，以完成轉換。

trans-unit.source: For a table that lists both the widening and narrowing conversions supported by the [Convert](xref:System.Convert) class, see [Type conversion tables](conversion-tables.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需列有 [Convert](xref:System.Convert) 類別支援之擴展與縮小轉換的表格，請參閱[類型轉換表](conversion-tables.md)。

trans-unit.source: Custom conversions with the ChangeType method
trans-unit.target: 使用 ChangeType 方法進行自訂轉換

trans-unit.source: In addition to supporting conversions to each of the base types, the [Convert](xref:System.Convert) class can be used to convert a custom type to one or more predefined types.
trans-unit.target: [Convert](xref:System.Convert) 類別除了支援每一個基底類型的轉換，也可以用於將自訂類型轉換為一個或多個預先定義的類型。

trans-unit.source: This conversion is performed by the [Convert.ChangeType(Object, Type, IFormatProvider)](xref:System.Convert.ChangeType(System.Object,System.Type,System.IFormatProvider)) method, which in turn wraps a call to the [IConvertible.ToType](xref:System.IConvertible.ToType(System.Type,System.IFormatProvider)) method of the value parameter.
trans-unit.target: 這種轉換由 [Convert.ChangeType(Object, Type, IFormatProvider)](xref:System.Convert.ChangeType(System.Object,System.Type,System.IFormatProvider)) 方法執行，而這個方法會進一步包裝值參數之 [IConvertible.ToType](xref:System.IConvertible.ToType(System.Type,System.IFormatProvider)) 方法的呼叫。

trans-unit.source: This means that the object represented by the value parameter must provide an implementation of the [IConvertible](xref:System.IConvertible) interface.
trans-unit.target: 這表示由值參數所表示的物件必須提供 [IConvertible](xref:System.IConvertible) 介面的實作。

trans-unit.source: Because the [Convert.ChangeType(Object, Type)](xref:System.Convert.ChangeType(System.Object,System.Type)) and [Convert.ChangeType(Object, Type, IFormatProvider)](xref:System.Convert.ChangeType(System.Object,System.Type,System.IFormatProvider)) methods use a [Type](xref:System.Type) object to specify the target type to which value is converted, they can be used to perform a dynamic conversion to an object whose type is not known at compile time.
trans-unit.target: 由於 [Convert.ChangeType(Object, Type)](xref:System.Convert.ChangeType(System.Object,System.Type)) 和 [Convert.ChangeType(Object, Type, IFormatProvider)](xref:System.Convert.ChangeType(System.Object,System.Type,System.IFormatProvider)) 方法會使用 [Type](xref:System.Type) 物件指定轉換 值的目標類型，因此這兩種方法可以在編譯時期用來動態轉換不明類型的物件。

trans-unit.source: However, note that the [IConvertible](xref:System.IConvertible) implementation of value must still support this conversion.
trans-unit.target: 但請注意，值的 [IConvertible](xref:System.IConvertible) 實作仍然必須支援這項轉換。

trans-unit.source: The following example illustrates a possible implementation of the [IConvertible](xref:System.IConvertible) interface that allows a `TemperatureCelsius` object to be converted to a `TemperatureFahrenheit` object and vice versa.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例說明 [IConvertible](xref:System.IConvertible) 介面可能的實作，這種實作允許 `TemperatureCelsius` 物件轉換為 `TemperatureFahrenheit` 物件，反之亦然。

trans-unit.source: The example defines a base class, `Temperature`, that implements the [IConvertible](xref:System.IConvertible) interface and overrides the [Object.ToString](xref:System.Object.ToString) method.
trans-unit.target: 範例中定義一個基底類別 `Temperature`，這個類別實作 [IConvertible](xref:System.IConvertible) 介面並覆寫 [Object.ToString](xref:System.Object.ToString) 方法。

trans-unit.source: The derived `TemperatureCelsius` and `TemperatureFahrenheit` classes each override the `ToType` and the `ToString` methods of the base class.
trans-unit.target: 衍生的 `TemperatureCelsius` 和 `TemperatureFahrenheit` 類別分別覆寫基底類別的 `ToType` 和 `ToString` 方法。

trans-unit.source: The following example illustrates several calls to these [IConvertible](xref:System.IConvertible) implementations to convert `TemperatureCelsius` objects to `TemperatureFahrenheit` objects and vice versa.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例說明對這些 [IConvertible](xref:System.IConvertible) 實作的多個呼叫，以將 `TemperatureCelsius` 物件轉換為 `TemperatureFahrenheit` 物件，反之亦然。

trans-unit.source: The TypeConverter class
trans-unit.target: TypeConverter 類別

trans-unit.source: .NET also allows you to define a type converter for a custom type by extending the [System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter](xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter) class and associating the type converter with the type through a [System.ComponentModel.TypeConverterAttribute](xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverterAttribute) attribute.
trans-unit.target: .NET 也可讓您延伸 [System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter](xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter) 類別，並透過 [System.ComponentModel.TypeConverterAttribute](xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverterAttribute) 屬性來建立類型轉換器與類型之間的關聯，以定義自訂類型的類型轉換器。

trans-unit.source: The following table highlights the differences between this approach and implementing the [IConvertible](xref:System.IConvertible) interface for a custom type.
trans-unit.target: 下表特別強調這種作法與實作自訂類型之 [IConvertible](xref:System.IConvertible) 介面的差異。

trans-unit.source: Design-time support can be provided for a custom type only if it has a type converter defined for it.
trans-unit.target: 只要自訂類型有為其定義的類型轉換子，即會提供設計階段支援給自訂類型。

trans-unit.source: Conversion using TypeConverter
trans-unit.target: 使用 TypeConverter 的轉換

trans-unit.source: Conversion using IConvertible
trans-unit.target: 使用 IConvertible 的轉換

trans-unit.source: Is implemented for a custom type by deriving a separate class from [TypeConverter](xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter).
trans-unit.target: 是從 [TypeConverter](xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter) 衍生另外一個類別，以針對自訂類型來實作。

trans-unit.source: This derived class is associated with the custom type by applying a [TypeConverterAttribute](xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverterAttribute) attribute.
trans-unit.target: 透過套用 [TypeConverterAttribute](xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverterAttribute) 屬性，將這個衍生類別與自訂類型建立關聯。

trans-unit.source: Is implemented by a custom type to perform conversion.
trans-unit.target: 是由自訂類型所實作來執行轉換。

trans-unit.source: A user of the type invokes an [IConvertible](xref:System.IConvertible) conversion method on the type.
trans-unit.target: 該類型的使用者可在該類型上叫用 [IConvertible](xref:System.IConvertible) 轉換方法。

trans-unit.source: Can be used both at design time and at run time.
trans-unit.target: 可以在設計階段和在執行階段兩處使用。

trans-unit.source: Can be used only at run time.
trans-unit.target: 只能在執行階段使用。

trans-unit.source: Uses reflection; therefore, is slower than conversion enabled by [IConvertible](xref:System.IConvertible).
trans-unit.target: 使用反映功能；因此，速度比 [IConvertible](xref:System.IConvertible) 所啟用的轉換還要慢。

trans-unit.source: Does not use reflection.
trans-unit.target: 不使用反映。

trans-unit.source: Allows two-way type conversions from the custom type to other data types, and from other data types to the custom type.
trans-unit.target: 允許在自訂類型與其他資料類型之間的雙向類型轉換。

trans-unit.source: For example, a [TypeConverter](xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter) defined for `MyType` allows conversions from `MyType` to [String](xref:System.String), and from [String](xref:System.String) to `MyType`.
trans-unit.target: 比方說，針對 `MyType` 所定義的 [TypeConverter](xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter) 允許從 `MyType` 轉換為 [String](xref:System.String)，也允許從 [String](xref:System.String) 轉換為 `MyType`。

trans-unit.source: Allows conversion from a custom type to other data types, but not from other data types to the custom type.
trans-unit.target: 允許從自訂類型轉換為其他資料類型，但不允許從其他資料類型轉換為自訂類型。

trans-unit.source: For more information about using type converters to perform conversions, see [System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter](xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter).
trans-unit.target: 如需使用類型轉換器執行轉換的詳細資訊，請參閱 [System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter](xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter)。

trans-unit.source: See also
trans-unit.target: 請參閱

trans-unit.source: [System.Convert](xref:System.Convert)
trans-unit.target: [System.Convert](xref:System.Convert)

trans-unit.source: [IConvertible](xref:System.IConvertible)
trans-unit.target: [IConvertible](xref:System.IConvertible)

trans-unit.source: [Type conversion tables](conversion-tables.md)
trans-unit.target: [類型轉換表](conversion-tables.md)
